[File: third_party/move/tools/move-asm/src/lib.rs] [Module: syntax] [Visibility Modifier Bypass] Can multiple visibility modifiers (public friend) on the same function be parsed, creating ambiguous access control? (High)

[File: third_party/move/tools/move-asm/src/lib.rs] [Module: syntax] [Attribute Validation] Are function attributes (#[persistent], #[module_lock]) validated to be used only on appropriate function types? (Medium)

[File: third_party/move/tools/move-asm/src/lib.rs] [Module: syntax] [Entry Function Constraints] Can entry modifier be combined with invalid visibility or return types, bypassing Move's entry function requirements? (High)

[File: third_party/move/tools/move-asm/src/lib.rs] [Module: syntax] [Struct Layout Validation] For enum definitions, can empty variant lists or variants without fields be parsed, violating Move's enum constraints? (Medium)

[File: third_party/move/tools/move-asm/src/lib.rs] [Module: syntax] [Type Parameter Constraints] When parsing type parameters with ability constraints, can conflicting constraints (e.g., copy+drop+!copy) be accepted? (Medium)

[File: third_party/move/tools/move-asm/src/lib.rs] [Module: syntax] [Local Declaration Ordering] Can local declarations be intermixed with instructions instead of strictly preceding them, violating the expected order? (Low)

[File: third_party/move/tools/move-asm/src/lib.rs] [Module: syntax] [Instruction Argument Count] Are instruction arguments properly validated against expected counts before passing to assembler, or can variable argument counts cause crashes? (High)

[File: third_party/move/tools/move-asm/src/lib.rs] [Module: syntax] [Friend Module Validation] Can friend declarations in scripts (not modules) be parsed, even though scripts cannot have friends? (Low)

[File: third_party/move/tools/move-asm/src/lib.rs] [Module: syntax] [Use Statement Ordering] Can use/import statements appear after struct/function definitions, causing forward reference issues? (Low)
[File: third_party/move/tools/move-asm/src/lib.rs] [Module: syntax] [Newline Handling Edge Cases] Can missing newlines at end of file cause the last instruction or declaration to be ignored? (Low)

[File: third_party/move/tools/move-asm/src/lib.rs] [Module: value] [Integer Conversion Overflow] In to_move_value() when converting AsmValue::Number to smaller integer types (u8, u16, i8, i16), can the try_into() conversions silently truncate or wrap values? (High)

[File: third_party/move/tools/move-asm/src/lib.rs] [Module: value] [Signed Number Min Value] For I256::MIN constant, does the special handling in check_signed_number() correctly prevent negation overflow? (Critical)

[File: third_party/move/tools/move-asm/src/lib.rs] [Module: value] [Address Byte Conversion] In u256_to_address() and address_to_u256(), can byte order reversal cause non-deterministic address encoding across different endianness systems? (Critical)

[File: third_party/move/tools/move-asm/src/lib.rs] [Module: value] [Vector Element Type Mismatch] When converting vector values, can heterogeneous element types bypass validation, creating vectors with inconsistent element types? (High)

[File: third_party/move/tools/move-asm/src/lib.rs] [Module: value] [Boolean Range Validation] For bool type conversion, are values > 1 properly rejected, or can non-zero values be interpreted as true? (Medium)
[File: third_party/move/tools/move-asm/src/lib.rs] [Module: value] [Nested Vector Depth] Can arbitrarily nested vectors cause stack overflow during recursive to_move_value() calls? (Medium)

[File: third_party/move/tools/move-asm/src/lib.rs] [Module: value] [Type Safety for Constants] Does to_move_value() reject attempts to create constant values for non-primitive types (structs, references, signers)? (High)

[File: third_party/move/tools/move-asm/src/lib.rs] [Module: value] [BCS Serialization Consistency] Are constant values serialized consistently via simple_serialize() to produce deterministic bytecode across different platforms? (High)

[File: third_party/move/tools/move-asm/src/lib.rs] [Module: value] [U256 Bounds Checking] When checking unsigned_number with max=U256::MAX, can overflow in comparison logic cause incorrect bounds validation? (Medium)

[File: third_party/move/tools/move-asm/src/lib.rs] [Module: value] [Signed Zero Representation] Are +0 and -0 handled identically in AsmValue::Number representation to ensure deterministic behavior? (Low)

[File: third_party/move/tools/move-asm/src/lib.rs] [Module: disassembler] [Invalid Module Deserialization] When disassembling potentially malicious compiled modules, can invalid bytecode cause crashes or undefined behavior in ModuleView construction? (High)

[File: third_party/move/tools/move-asm/src/lib.rs] [Module: disassembler] [Handle Index Out of Bounds] When accessing module handles, struct handles, or function handles by index, are bounds properly checked before dereferencing? (High)

[File: third_party/move/tools/move-asm/src/lib.rs] [Module: disassembler] [Infinite Recursion in Type Display] For recursive type definitions, can type_() function enter infinite recursion when formatting SignatureToken::Struct? (Medium)

[File: third_party/move/tools/move-asm/src/lib.rs] [Module: disassembler] [Field Name Resolution] In borrow_field() disassembly, can out-of-bounds field indices cause panic when resolving field names? (Medium)

[File: third_party/move/tools/move-asm/src/lib.rs] [Module: disassembler] [Variant Index Validation] When disassembling variant-related bytecode, are variant indices validated against actual variant count? (Medium)
